citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:49 PM on 23-
FEB-2022. The inspector arrived and called the primary phone number at 12:49 PM and left a voicemail. The licensee
called back within a couple minutes and notified the inspector that he was over 1.5 hours away and unavailable to return
to the property for an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:49 PM on 23-
FEB-2022. The inspector arrived and called the primary phone number at 12:49 PM and left a voicemail. The licensee 
called back within a couple minutes and notified the inspector that he was over 1.5 hours away and unavailable to return 
to the property for an inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
